ai-patthana16.51:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma
ai-patthana16.51:0.3_0: Not for the sake of a hundred years,
ai-patthana16.51:1.1_0: Not for the sake of non-existence, or for the sake of not giving up.
ai-patthana16.51:2.1_0: Not for the sake of non-existence, or for the sake of not giving up of resentment, not for the sake of repulsion, not for the sake of cause or reason.
ai-patthana16.51:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
